articles.title: Wipro windfall – promotions every quarter | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Wipro plans to offer employee promotions every quarter—a first for the Bengaluru-based company—and boost salaries of most of its workforce by 10% in September, with the top performers receiving more than 15% hikes.
articles.content: Wipro Ltd is overhauling its employee bonuses and increments to rein in high attrition and attract fresh talent as Indias technology sector continues to see a covid-induced boom in hiring. Indias fou… [+2974 chars]
